Failed while enabling CMSP: Encountered error in cmsp sub task 'IAMv2 Migration & Bootstrap':
pc.deployment.response: Failed in cmsp sub task 'IAMv2 Migration & Bootstrap'. Please check with CMSP team for further triaging

pc.deployment.exception_summary: No host has enough available resources
pc.deployment.response:
Hosts should have atleast these many resources as follows : 
For 1-node Small PC : 6vcpus and 26GiB RAM
For scaleout Small PC : 18vcpus and 78GiB RAM
For 1-node Large PC : 10vcpus and 44GiB RAM
For scaleout Large PC : 30vcpus and 132GiB RAM
Look into https://confluence.eng.nutanix.com:8443/pages/viewpage.action?spaceKey=PRIS&title=Triaging+RDM+PC+deployment+issues for more info
